name: On another world
description:
People want to survive because they are unsure of what happens after you die. The creatures from Planet_414, however, have a solid prove and now everyone wants to commit suicide.

Now it's your turn.

Stray on the last place you will live looking for resources and planing your death as your main goal is to die.

This game is made for the Beginners Circle Game Jam #3, and even though you can play the game, its far from finished.

Average Gameplay duration: 5 - 15 minutes
